title: Schema for declaring CircuiTikZ node- and path-style components

name.title: The CircuiTikZ node name, e.g. nigfete for a n channel MOSFET

groupName.title: The name of the group, e.g. Transistors

options.title: A list of options to set in CircuiTikZ

pins.title: A list of CircuiTikZ pin (anchor) names

displayName.title: The name to show in the UI

drawName.title: The unique (!) CircuiTikZ name used in to[...], e.g. american resistor (not R) for an resistor

aliases.title: Additional names which can be used in to[...]

shapeName.title: The shape name used internally by CircuiTikZ; can be used to create a node

groupName.title: The name of the group, e.g. Transistors

options.title: A list of options to set in CircuiTikZ

pins.title: A list of additional CircuiTikZ pin (anchor) names; e.g. for potentiometer

stroke.title: Draw a line through the component
